name: get-event-information-ack
description: Represents a BACnet GetEventInformation service acknowledgment, which returns a list of event summaries containing state, acknowledgment, and notification information for active events.

fields.name: list-of-event-summaries
object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the event-generating object.

fields.name: event-state
fields.description: The current event state of the object.

fields.name: acknowledged-transitions
fields.description: Bit flags indicating which event transitions have been acknowledged.

fields.name: event-timestamps
fields.description: An array of three timestamps for TO-OFFNORMAL, TO-FAULT, and TO-NORMAL transitions.

fields.name: notify-type
fields.description: The notification type (alarm or event) for this object.

fields.name: event-enable
fields.description: Bit flags indicating which event transitions are enabled.

fields.name: event-priorities
fields.description: An array of three priority values for TO-OFFNORMAL, TO-FAULT, and TO-NORMAL transitions.
A list of event summary entries, one for each active event.

fields.name: more-events
fields.description: Indicates whether more event information is available (true) or if all events have been returned (false).
